title: Effective Integration of Management Control Systems (MCS) and Organizational Learning: Simulation-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic business management concepts, organizational management experience, and foundational data analysis skills
context.additional_context: Large-group learning environment utilizing smartphone-based VR simulations with continuous formative feedback

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the cybernetic use of MCS (Management Control Systems) within organizations to explain mechanisms for facilitating organizational learning.
Learners can analyze the interaction between MCS utilization and feedforward strategies on organizational learning through structural equation modeling via simulation.
Learners can interpret the impact of MCS usage on individual job performance, focusing on the mediating effect of organizational learning.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
